content:
Hi we are going to work on FHIR API for cure rules g.10 , we are new to this project. Is there any suggestion on how and where to start on this project.
Please help.
appreciate if someone can help on this

@Yunwei Wang
Cure rules Standardized API for Single and multiple Patient Services
https://www.healthit.gov/sites/default/files/page/2020-11/API-Resource-Guide_v1_0.pdf
What are the uses cases to support? Extract the data from that into an overarching model. Transform that into FHIR representations.
This is a very huge topic. It is hard to say where to start. You can start with the API document, (g)(10), CCG, and Test Procedure (the later three are mentioned in API document).
